data.comment: The match is underway in Orlando.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in New York City.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York City.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to New York City.
Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toronto's half?
New York City's Jesus Medina breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Toronto at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Free kick New York City.
Alex Chilowicz signals a New York City throw-in in Toronto's half.
In the minute 5, Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
New York City are in shooting range from this free kick.
Jesus Medina is on target to give New York City a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 5, That's a fine assist from Anton Tinnerholm.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York City.
In the minute 7, New York City's Alexander Callens misses with an attempt on goal.
Alex Chilowicz awards Toronto a goal kick.
New York City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 9, Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Throw-in for New York City at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Free kick Toronto.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alexander Ring (New York City) has received a yellow card from Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
New York City to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Free kick New York City.
In the minute 15, Toronto's Omar Gonzalez has been booked in Orlando.
Toronto have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
In the minute 17, Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York City.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Toronto throw-in in New York City's half.
In the minute 19, Toronto needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
At ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, New York City are penalized for being offside.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Alex Chilowicz awards New York City a goal kick.
Throw-in New York City.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for New York City at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Toronto are coming forward and Marky Delgado gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
New York City have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York City.
Alex Chilowicz waits before resuming play because Alexandru Mitrita for New York City is still down.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Ronny Deila is making the team's first substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Maxi Moralez replacing Ismael Tajouri.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for New York City at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 35, Alexander Callens for New York City drives towards goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the finish is unsuccessful.
New York City have a dangerous throw-in.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 36, Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for New York City, close to Toronto's area.
Throw-in for New York City close to the penalty box.
Valentin Castellanos gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York City.
In the minute 37, Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Free kick in a good position for Toronto!
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Alexandru Mitrita is back on his feet again.
Can Toronto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York City's half?
Throw-in New York City.
In the minute 42, Free kick New York City.
New York City's Anton Tinnerholm is on target but unsuccessful.
Toronto have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 44, Free kick Toronto.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Richie Laryea of Toronto gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for New York City at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York City.
In Orlando Toronto drive forward through Jayden Nelson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
New York City are caught offside.
In the minute 49, Toronto have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Throw-in for New York City at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 52, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 55, New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Valentin Castellanos extends New York City's lead to 0-2.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Greg Vanney (Toronto) is making a first substitution, with Jozy Altidore replacing Nick DeLeon.
In the minute 57, Erickson Gallardo is replacing Jayden Nelson for Toronto at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Jonathan Osorio is on a sub for Pablo Piatti for Toronto.
In the minute 58, New York City have a goal kick.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
The match at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex has been interrupted briefly for a check on Maxime Chanot, who is down injured.
In the minute 61, New York City's Maxime Chanot is back in action after a slight knock.
Toronto needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in Toronto.
New York City to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick Toronto.
New York City's James Sands has been booked in Orlando.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for New York City at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
New York City push upfield but Alex Chilowicz quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Toronto close to the penalty box.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for New York City at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Ronny Deila (New York City) is making a second substitution, with Heber replacing Alexandru Mitrita.
In Orlando, New York City push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, New York City make their third substitution with Gary Mackay Steven replacing Valentin Castellanos.
Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for New York City, close to Toronto's area.
In the minute 74, Can New York City capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Toronto drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 75, Toronto make their fourth substitution with Jacob Shaffelburg replacing Richie Laryea.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Toronto drive upfield and Erickson Gallardo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New York City defender.
In the minute 79, Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Toronto to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
In the minute 79, Alex Chilowicz signals a New York City throw-in in Toronto's half.
Patrick Mullins is on a sub for Marky Delgado for Toronto.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Toronto throw-in in New York City's half.
Goal! Maxi Moralez extends New York City's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 81, Heber with an assist there.
Throw-in New York City.
Jonathan Osorio for Toronto has been booked by Alex Chilowicz and receives a first yellow card.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, New York City make their fifth substitution with Keaton Parks replacing Maxi Moralez.
Nicolas Acevedo is on a sub for Jesus Medina for New York City.
In the minute 85, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York City just outside Toronto's area.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Goal! Patrick Mullins pulls one back to make it 1-3.
In the minute 87, Great play from Jozy Altidore to set up the goal.
Toronto are coming forward and Jacob Shaffelburg gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Alex Chilowicz awards New York City a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Toronto.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
At ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
New York City are whistled for offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
